comments.body:
@fiznool @sheetalkamat can we move this type to an own interface? Because I had a method before which was returning a shared config (for our microservices) the type `express.CookieOptions`.

Now after this PR I have to create manually an interface to keep the code. These types should provide all necessary types (including the cookie structure).
Please submit the PR with the changes for these changes.
I didn't know one can do this. Thanks a lot @fiznool !
